articles.title: Suzlon shares soar, but headwinds could be building up - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The company's market capitalisation has multiplied by over 2.2 times in the last two months, reaching Rs 2.25 lakh crore from Rs 1.01 lakh crore. The stock price has increased by more than 100 percent in the period.
